room_title: Escape room "Casino Heist" by Escape on Main in St. Louis
room_address: 340 North Main Street Ste 205 Saint Charles, MO 63301
room_description:
You are a member of America’s most successful crime syndicate.  Today, you’ll be facing your greatest challenge yet, as you and your team attempt a heist at the River Valley Casino.

Your recon team has just completed phase one of the heist – they have temporarily neutralized the security cameras and have discreetly hidden clues, tools and hints which you will need to complete the heist.

The security system has been deactivated for 60 minutes. After that amount of time, the alarm will sound, and you will have to escape before law enforcement arrives.
